channel.title: golang on Sergei Eremeev
channel.description: Recent content in golang on Sergei Eremeev

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: This post is the first blog article created at Eremeeva.CA. All devs start their journey with Hello World! So do I. This is not my first attempt to start a blog. I used to have one at prounckk.wordpress.com. It was about my life in Canada and was created to share photos, impressions and thoughts with my friends that stayed in my country of origin. But it was not the first one!
